medical_history.chief_complaint: Right sided abdominal pain with associated nausea and chills.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain started on the night prior to admission. The patient reports no emesis and noted some chills.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Atrial fibrillation, hypertension, hypercholesterolemia, premature ventricular contractions, peripheral vascular disease, restless leg syndrome, history of duodenal ulcer, diverticulosis with hemorrhoidal bleeding, prostate cancer, and squamous cell carcinoma of the left shin.
